DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine pharmacokinetics bioequivalence isotretinoin formulation administration single dos normal , non-smoking , healthy male fast condition
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Study Isotretinoin Capsules 40 mg Under Fasting Condition
DOC.detailed_description: An open label , randomize , two-treatment , single dose , oral bioequivalence study Isotretinoin capsule 40 mg Dr. Reddy 's Laboratories Limited , fast condition
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy male 18 45 year age inclusive . 2 . Informed nature study give write informed consent . 3 . Have body weight within 15 % appropriate range define 1983 Metropolitan Life Company table weigh least 125 lb . ( Appendix I ) . Exclusion Criteria 1 . Hypersensitivity isotretinoin related compound . 2 . Any history clinical condition might affect drug absorption , metabolism excretion . 3 . Recent history mental illness , drug addiction , drug abuse alcoholism . 4 . Donation great 500 ml blood past 4 week prior study dose difficulty donate blood . 5 . Received investigational drug within 4 week prior study dose . 6 . Currently take prescription medication within 7 day prior study dose overthecounter medication within 3 day study dose . This prohibition include vitamin herbal preparation take nutritional supplement nontherapeutic indication judge attend physician . 7 . Regular tobacco use 3 month prior study dose .
